# Next.js Draggable Terminal Project

## Project Overview
Next.js application with TypeScript featuring a draggable xterm.js terminal using react-dnd.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js (App Router)
- TypeScript
- xterm.js for terminal emulation
- react-dnd for drag and drop
